task.summary: Some changes to lastId calculation in EventDaoImpl
Some changes to lastId calculation in EventDaoImpl
Added improved validation to event update
Changed UserDaoImpl.getUserByEmail(String). NoSuchElementException when no elements found.
Added constructor without Id to UserImpl
BookingFacadeImpl partially covered with integration tests (ticket booking not covered)
Changed id of ticket to long
No need of testing DAO, there must be no logic
